scripts.build:custom-css: parcel build src/mastodon-bird-ui.scss --dist-dir dist --no-source-maps && npm run banner
scripts.build:mastodon-core: npm run build:mastodon-core:copy && npm run build:mastodon-core:entry
scripts.build:mastodon-core:copy: rm -rf dist/mastodon-core && mkdir -p dist/mastodon-core/mastodon-bird-ui && cp -r src/common src/components src/layouts dist/mastodon-core/mastodon-bird-ui/
scripts.build:mastodon-core:entry: cp src/mastodon-bird-ui.scss dist/mastodon-core/ && sed -i 's|@use "common/|@use "mastodon-bird-ui/common/|g; s|@use "components/|@use "mastodon-bird-ui/components/|g; s|@use "layouts/|@use "mastodon-bird-ui/layouts/|g' dist/mastodon-core/mastodon-bird-ui.scss
scripts.banner: for f in dist/*.css; do echo "/* Mastodon Bird UI v$npm_package_version - https://github.com/ronilaukkarinen/mastodon-bird-ui */" | cat - "$f" > temp && mv temp "$f"; done
